channel.title: What's moparclassic?
channel.description:
What in the world is it?
2nd topic w00t

item.title: What's moparclassic?
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:25, topic:529938”][quote author=kickingjamie link=topic=648694.msg4362397#msg4362397 date=1379014170]
Jesus Christ this environment is not child freindly. How can you take such a simple question completely out of context and act like a spoon is stuck up your ass? I’m not here to argue with you and I’m not prepared to so I’ll end it here with a fudge you and have a wonderful day.
[/quote]The RSC was pretty much never child friendly… Most of us have been playing for around 10 years and are adults, so we treat people like adults, unless they need to be treated differently.

Also, I don’t think you even know what, “out of context” actually means, because your question was asked in an inappropriate context, in other words, it was irrelevant.

Anyway, you really should grow up[/quote]

Anywhore, looks nice guys. Unfortunately, I can’t stand the gameplay of RSC, and I did play it back in its prime. Never enjoyed it TBH. I like how far you have come though.

Read full topic

item.title: What's moparclassic?
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“kickingjamie, post:24, topic:529938”]Jesus Christ this environment is not child freindly. How can you take such a simple question completely out of context and act like a spoon is stuck up your ass? I’m not here to argue with you and I’m not prepared to so I’ll end it here with a fudge you and have a wonderful day.[/quote]The RSC was pretty much never child friendly… Most of us have been playing for around 10 years and are adults, so we treat people like adults, unless they need to be treated differently.

Also, I don’t think you even know what, “out of context” actually means, because your question was asked in an inappropriate context, in other words, it was irrelevant.

Anyway, you really should grow up.

Read full topic

@kickingjamie wrote:

Jesus Christ this environment is not child freindly. How can you take such a simple question completely out of context and act like a spoon is stuck up your ass? I’m not here to argue with you and I’m not prepared to so I’ll end it here with a fuck you and have a wonderful day.

Read full topic

item.title: What's moparclassic?
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“kickingjamie, post:17, topic:529938”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=648694.msg4362352#msg4362352 date=1379010872]

[quote author=kickingjamie link=topic=648694.msg4362344#msg4362344 date=1379009808]

[quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=648694.msg4362339#msg4362339 date=1379008879]

Why RSC and not runescape 2? I imagine a lot more people would be interested in that.
[/quote]Because those of us from the RSC scene don’t like RS2…

Maybe you should talk to MITB if you want to make a RS2 server like this.

Oh no, don’t get me wrong, I like that this has been brought out - it’s a really good idea. I’m just curious why runescape classic?
[/quote]What don’t you understand? The RSC community created a RSC server… Why would we make a RS2 server when the overwhelming majority of us think it’s complete shit?

why do you enjoy classic?

[/quote]That is completely irrelevant… That’s like asking someone why they like cars, planes, trains, video games, skateboarding, biking, hiking, working out, rock climbing, chess, RS2, yoga, etc.

WHY DO YOU ENJOY CLASSIC? How in anyway is that irrelevant? Also each of those examples have reasons as to why they are enjoyable. If you ask anyone who has a hobby why they enjoy that hobby there is bound to be an answer. I’d like to know what you find enjoyable about classic, is that really such a hard question.

Why are you taking offense because I asked why you enjoy something?[/quote]How is my reasoning for liking RSC relevant at all? Everyone has their own reasons and they’re highly subjective, exactly like the reasoning for all of the other things I listed.

What you’re doing is equivalent to walking into a car show, and asking what a car show is and why a particular person, who is helping run the show, likes car shows.

Anyway, if you want my answer, go dig through my past posts and find it; I’m done wasting my time with irrelevant and outright dumb questions.

Read full topic

item.title: What's moparclassic?
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:21, topic:529938”][quote author=kickingjamie link=topic=648694.msg4362373#msg4362373 date=1379012319]

kickingjamie doesn’t realize he’s on the rsc side of the forums.
[/quote]What are you trying to say?

I am saying the environment you’re in is completely different from any other section of moparscape/mitb. The sense of humor and level of respect is totally opposite. What you will learn if you stick around these parts is that the people in the rsc scene are your family, friends and your worse enemies. I can’t really describe it but if you feel the need take it up with Davidi2 and ask him about his experiences.[/quote]
Well that’s just fudgeing stupid. (sensor has ruined the impact of that statement… Good job.)

Read full topic

item.title: What's moparclassic?
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

[quote=“kickingjamie, post:20, topic:529938”][quote author=Rodgerwilco link=topic=648694.msg4362369#msg4362369 date=1379012066]
kickingjamie doesn’t realize he’s on the rsc side of the forums.
[/quote]What are you trying to say?[/quote]

I am saying the environment you’re in is completely different from any other section of moparscape/mitb. The sense of humor and level of respect is totally opposite. What you will learn if you stick around these parts is that the people in the rsc scene are your family, friends and your worse enemies. I can’t really describe it but if you feel the need take it up with Davidi2 and ask him about his experiences.

<Davidi2> lol <Davidi2> I remember when I tried to moderate rsc <Davidi2> so many fudgeing morons <Davidi2> well not morons per say <Davidi2> but like <Davidi2> holy shit <Davidi2> you cant say ANYTHING without them looking through your entire history and trying to dig up dirt on you <Davidi2> or them blaming you for something completely irrelevant and unfounded

Read full topic

item.title: What's moparclassic?
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

vortex:

why should there be a specific reason to enjoy something

I never said there is a ‘specific’ reason to enjoy something, but what I’m saying is that there is always a reason or many reasons that you enjoy something. My question still stands, why do you enjoy classic?

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:19, topic:529938”]kickingjamie doesn’t realize he’s on the rsc side of the forums. [/quote]What are you trying to say?

Read full topic

item.title: What's moparclassic?
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:16, topic:529938”][quote author=kickingjamie link=topic=648694.msg4362344#msg4362344 date=1379009808]

[quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=648694.msg4362339#msg4362339 date=1379008879]

[quote author=kickingjamie link=topic=648694.msg4362313#msg4362313 date=1379001995]

Why RSC and not runescape 2? I imagine a lot more people would be interested in that.
[/quote]Because those of us from the RSC scene don’t like RS2…

Maybe you should talk to MITB if you want to make a RS2 server like this.

Oh no, don’t get me wrong, I like that this has been brought out - it’s a really good idea. I’m just curious why runescape classic?
[/quote]What don’t you understand? The RSC community created a RSC server… Why would we make a RS2 server when the overwhelming majority of us think it’s complete shit?

why do you enjoy classic?

[/quote]That is completely irrelevant… That’s like asking someone why they like cars, planes, trains, video games, skateboarding, biking, hiking, working out, rock climbing, chess, RS2, yoga, etc.[/quote]
WHY DO YOU ENJOY CLASSIC? How in anyway is that irrelevant? Also each of those examples have reasons as to why they are enjoyable. If you ask anyone who has a hobby why they enjoy that hobby there is bound to be an answer. I’d like to know what you find enjoyable about classic, is that really such a hard question.

Why are you taking offense because I asked why you enjoy something?

Read full topic
